actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT Applications.appID, Applications.applicationName, Applications.applicationType, Applications.applicationStatus, Applications.techType, Entities.entityName, Clients.clientName, Applications.portalAppID, Applications.initialScore, Applications.bidSelectionAwardStatus, Applications.fundingRequest, Applications.referenceBudget, Applications.currentBudget, Entities.entityType
	FROM Clients INNER JOIN 
		(Applications INNER JOIN Entities ON Applications.entityID = Entities.entityID) ON Clients.clientID = Entities.clientID
	
	WHERE (((Clients.clientID)={{appsmith.store.clientID}}))
	
AND ({{!Select10.selectedOptionValue}} OR (Applications.applicationType = '{{Select10.selectedOptionValue}}'))
	

ORDER BY entityName ASC, applicationName ASC;
